description: This is a React component named TodoApp that serves as the main UI for a Todo list application. It manages task list state, toggling completion status, and adding new tasks. It imports React hooks and a child component TodoList.

methods.name: TodoApp()
methods.description: Main functional React component managing todo items, toggling completion, and adding new tasks.

methods.name: handleToggle
methods.description: Callback to toggle the completion status of a task by its ID.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Callback to add a new task with a unique ID and a default title.
